cards.title: Vagabond
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Another fight? Let's see what tricks this one has in store.

cards.title: Alchemic Collector
body: Your hero targets regain 2 HP each.
If {Vagabond} is the only active Hero, {Vagabond} deals up to 2 targets 3 fire damage each.
Otherwise, other players' hero targets regain 2 HP each.

flavorQuotes.text: Here's a set for healing, two for{br} unconsciousness, and one for an{br} explosion. Don't shake that one.

cards.title: Imbued Detonation
body: {Vagabond} deals 1 target 2 energy damage.
If {Vagabond} is the only active Hero, {Vagabond} deals each target 3 fire damage.
Otherwise, {Vagabond} deals 1 target 2 fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: It's a trick to make metal {br}explode, and coins are easier to{br} replace than good knives.

cards.title: Excessive Preparation
body: You may destroy an ongoing or environment card.
If {Vagabond} is the only active Hero, use up to 2 powers now.
Otherwise, another player may play a card now.

flavorQuotes.text: You had four plans for psychics?
Five. Apparently I had my memory {br}wiped after preparing the fifth.

cards.title: Probing Strike
body: Draw 1 cards. {Vagabond} deals 1 target 1 melee damage.
If {Vagabond} is the only active Hero, you may play a non-solo card.
Otherwise, a Hero other than {Vagabond} may deal 1 target 2 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I can break walls! {br}And what can your puny arms do?

cards.title: Improvise
body: You may draw 2 cards.
If {Vagabond} is the only active Hero, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a one-shot card, put it in play or in your hand, and shuffle the other cards into your deck.
Otherwise, up to 2 other players may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: I've got some rope {br}and a ten-foot pole. More than {br}enough to work with.

cards.title: Unified Assault
body: You may use a power now.
If {Vagabond} is the only active Hero, {Vagabond} deals 1 target 3 melee damage.
Otherwise, another player may use a power now.

cards.title: Endless Pouches
body: When this card enters play, use the power on it.
powers: If Kiwi is in play, draw 1 card. Otherwise, search your hand, deck and trash for Kiwi, play it, and shuffle your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: It's standard gear where I'm from. {br}I just have spares.

cards.title: Twin Fang Dagger
body: When this card enters play, use the power on it.
powers: {Vagabond} deals 1 target 1 melee damage and 1 irreducible toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: The fangs aren't even {br}the oddest gift he's given me.

cards.title: Flash-Step Boots
body: When this card enters play, use the power on it.

cards.title: Bottled Lightning
body: When this card enters play, use the power on it.
powers: 1 target regains 1 HP. Until the start of your next turn, increase damage dealt by that target by 1.

cards.title: Kiwi
body: Once per turn, after you use a power, you may use that power again.

flavorQuotes.text: If you need me, {br}I'll be in the bag working on {br}my latest piece!

cards.title: Feign Death
body: When {Vagabond} would be destroyed, instead, restore {Vagabond} to 7 HP and destroy this card.
When this card is destroyed, search your deck for a Solo card, play it, shuffle your deck, and remove this card from the game.
powers: {Vagabond} deals each non-Hero target 2 fire Damage. Destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Half the villains you fight have {br}copies of themselves running around. {br}I'm allowed a fake or two.

cards.title: Taking Care of Something
body: {Vagabond} and {Vagabond}'s cards cannot affect or be affected by other Heroes and their cards. [i](Your cards will treat [/i]{Vagabond}[i] as the only active Hero.)[/i]
At the start of your turn, destroy up to 1 Ongoing card, up to 1 Environment card, and up to 1 target with 7 or fewer HP. Then, you may play a non-Solo card. Then, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: It's weird when we come back to {br}our problems solved without any idea{br} how he solved them.

cards.title: Clandestine Executioner
body: {Vagabond} and {Vagabond}'s cards cannot affect or be affected by other Heroes and their cards. [i](Your cards will treat [/i]{Vagabond}[i] as the only active Hero.)[/i]
Increase damage dealt by {Vagabond} by 1.
At the start of your turn, you may use a power. Then, you may play a non-Solo card. Then, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: They know of how I fight. {br}I'd rather not have them {br}know of how I kill.

cards.title: Makeshift Diversion
body: {Vagabond} and {Vagabond}'s cards cannot affect or be affected by other Heroes and their cards. [i](Your cards will treat [/i]{Vagabond}[i] as the only active Hero.)[/i]
Reduce damage taken by {Vagabond} 1.
At the start of your turn, put the top card of the Environment Deck on top of the Villain Deck. Then, you may play a non-Solo card. Then, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: If the golems and the spiders {br}are busy fighting each other, {br}they're not fighting us.

promoCards.title: Vagabond - Elusive
body: Untraced Paths
powers: Until the end of your turn, {Vagabond} and {Vagabond}'s cards cannot affect or be affected by other Heroes and their cards. Draw a card or play a card.

One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: And here I was hoping I wouldn't meet any familiar faces.
